rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3454, 3460, 3462, 3465, 3467, 3468, 3470, P4001, P6002}

description: Students completing this unit will develop an in depth knowledge of the identification and management of common dermatological problems. The focus of the unit is to provide care based on the principles of quality use of medicines to patients in both hospital and community settings.Prescribed Text:Skin Disease- Diagnosis and Treatment by Thomas P Habif3ednISBN 978-0-323-07700-2
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
